item.title: Destroying the sneeze or kkoroken
item.summary: Sneezing in the early morning considered to be unfortunate. In the Katkop dialect, by Díä!kwãin (L V. 21. 5654 rev. and 5655 rev., note). How to destroy a Sneeze. (L V.-22. 5658 rev., note). Sneezing drives away the game. The action or ritual called kkoroken is used to abort a sneeze.
item.comments: 1) Dia!kwain heard this from his parents and also experienced it in person, 2) See also The Moon, not to be looked at, when game is shot and Sneezing: to be avoided when game is shot, 3) This story is found in Book V-21
item.author: Dia!kwain (David Hoesar) (V)
